description: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and BuyandSell posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by May 5th, 2023 at 14:00 PM EDT. All bids submitted after 14:00 PM EDT will result in the bid being declared non-responsive. This requirement is for the provision of VMware professional services. It is intended to result in the award of 3 contracts, each for 2 year plus 3 one-year irrevocable options allowing Canada to extend the term of the contract(s).",
full_summary:
### VMware Professional Services Contract

#### Government Of Canada Tender Notice

**Contract Title and Reference Number:**
Title: VMware Professional Services
Reference Number: WS3839493603

**Tender Submission Due Date:**
April 28, 2023 revised; the closing date and time for submitting required supporting documentation and tender submission is now May 5, 2023 at 14:00 PM EDT.

**Contract Overview:**

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) intends to award 3 contracts for VMware professional services. The contracts will have a duration of 2 years plus 3 one-year irrevocable options, allowing Canada to extend the term of the contract.

**Eligibility:**
The contract is open to Canadian firms with the necessary experience and expertise to provide professional services for VMware solutions. The services include consulting, implementation, and support for various VMware products.

**Notice Type and Procurement Method:**
Notice Type: Request for Proposal
Procurement Method: Competitive - Open bidding

**Trade Agreements:**
This procurement is subject to the provisions of the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement

**Region of Delivery:**
The services will be delivered in the following region:

* National Capital Region (NCR)

**Contact Information:**
For further information, please contact Nathalie Hamelin (SPAC/PSPC) at
nathalie.hamelin@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.

**Notice URL:**
The notice can be accessed at the following URL: http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15427918.



---

This rewritten entry maintains the essential details and requirements of the original contract notice while presenting the information in a clear, concise, and professional manner.
